# Table Control

## Dependencies
```javascript
npm install  antd @ant-design/icons moment papaparse
```

## Installation

## Usage
```typescript jsx


function App() {
  return <Table
      fetch={async ()=>{
        return  Array(50).fill(0).map((value, index) => ({
          name: `Name : ${index}`,
          title: `Title : ${index}`,
          qty: Math.ceil(Math.random() * 1000),
          state: index % 2 === 0,
          date: moment().format("yyyy-MM-DD")
        }))
      }}
      save={async (row)=>{
        return row;
      }}
      delete={async (row)=>{
        return row;
      }}
      columns={async ()=>{
        return [
          {
            title:"Test 1",
            dataIndex: "name",
            type: ColumnType.string,
            visible: true,
            filter:true,
            schemaIndex:0
          },
          {
            title:"Test 2",
            dataIndex: "title",
            type: ColumnType.string,
            visible: true,
            sorter:true,
            filter:true,
            schemaIndex:1
          },
          {
            title:"Test 3",
            dataIndex: "qty",
            type: ColumnType.int,
            visible: true,
            sorter: true,
            filter:true,
            schemaIndex:2
          },
          {
            title:"Test 4",
            dataIndex: "state",
            type: ColumnType.boolean,
            visible: true,
            filter:true,
            schemaIndex:3
          },
          {
            title:"Test 4",
            dataIndex: "date",
            type: ColumnType.date,
            dateOut: "yyyy-MM-DD",
            visible:true,
            filter: true,
            schemaIndex:4,
            editable:true
          }
        ]
      }}
      saveColumn={async (columns)=>{
        return columns;
      }}
      title={`App : Table`}
      header={true}
      actions={{
        width:160,
        refresh:true,
        add:true,
        search:true,
        settings:true,
        export:true,
        delete:true,
        edit:true,
        select:true,
        import:true
      }}
      customActions={(row,index)=>{
        return <Button icon={<CloudDownloadOutlined/>}/>
      }}
      validateAction={(type, row, index)=>{
        switch (type){
          case "select":
            return index %3 === 0
          case "edit":
            return index %3 === 1
          case "delete":
            return index %3 === 2

        }
      }}
      headerButtons={[
          <Divider key={1} type={`vertical`}/>,
          <Button key={2} icon={<AppstoreAddOutlined/>}/>
      ]}

  />
}
```
